channel.title: Switches on Harry John
channel.description: Recent content in Switches on Harry John

item.title: EqualLogic VMware iSCSI Setup -- Part 3: PowerConnect Configuration
item.description: Recently I configured a set of PowerConnect 7048 switches for iSCSI following all the standards and best practices I could find. Actually I had prepared the PowerConnect iSCSI configuration a few months ago, I have been waiting for the Dell experts to confirm the configuration is current best practice and fit for our environment.
